name: Tetragon (Stabeor)
description:
Thrust : Space

Rotate backwards : A or Left Arrow

Rotate forward : D or Right Arrow

Pause : Esc

Continue option only works in desktop version, not browser one.

This is an early-stage prototype, initially created for training purposes. I'll keep adding more levels and features, possibly sequences with a different gameplay so it doesn't get boring. Feel free to comment and give some feedback (game mechanics and interest, difficulty, bugs, feature suggestions...), so I can improve the game and my skills !

Thanks for playing !
